segments.text: John , you have done a good job . Our new series computer is appreciated by the guests . They intend to sign contracts with our company . You really did a good job .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . I can't imagine the design of the new computer is so popular among computer users .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hah , as the sale department director of our team , you are the best .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am flattered . But I am not sure whether the manager is satisfied with it . She asked me to her office .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why not ? You've done so well for the company . She should give you a prize .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I feel nervous when I face her . She looks so serious when we have a conversation all the time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Come on ! What are you nervous about ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It is said that the sales for the new computer did not meet the expectation .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But the sale number is close to the predicted amount .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm still nervous . I don't know what to say to the manager . I always feel ill at ease in that kind of place .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Take it easy . Be confident . I'm sure you can do it .
segments.speaker: S1
